title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name, but this is not found when searching for declarations.
EB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Enter a search query for declarations.
5. Click on the search button.
6. Notice that no results are displayed.
7. Right-click on the package in the Package view.
8. Select the 'Search' option from the context menu.
9. Enter the same search query for declarations.
10. Click on the search button.
11. Notice that the results are displayed correctly.
